General.Name: Kapu
General.Description: Kapu is a decentralized platform that aims to preserve the archeological finds all around the world using the Blockchain technology. Kapu will provide a global index that will be free for universities and ministries. The KAPU token is a DPoS cryptocurrency.

ICO.Description:
Kapu is a decentralized platform that aims to preserve the archeological finds all around the world using the Blockchain technology. Kapu will provide a global index that will be free for universities and ministries. The KAPU token is a DPoS cryptocurrency.

Team:

  • Martino Merola: CEO 
  • Lars Rensing: ARK Escrow
  • Giorgio Isola: Art Director
  • Elenora Gandolfi: Archeology Advisor

The Kapu ICO started on the 16th of September, 2017 and will last until the 16th of October, 2017 or when the 2000 BTC hard cap is reached. The tokens reserved for the ICO represent 86.95% of the 115M initial supply. The ICO funding target is 700 BTC. 

Token Reserve Split (XX%):

  • 100.000.000 ICO Investitors
  • 5.000.000 Project Developer
  • 2.000.000 Advisor
  • 5.000.000 ARK’s Team
  • 2.000.000 Bounties
  • 1.000.000 Community Project

KAPU features an Escrow agent and bonus/bounty campaigns. The token is mineable through a DPoS system.

Bonus Structure:

  • 16 - 19 September 30% BONUS

  • 20 - 25 September 20% BONUS

  • 26 September - 3 October 10% BONUS

  • 4 - 10 October 5% BONUS

  • 11 - 19 October 0% BONUS
